scenario: High-profile divorce proceedings between celebrity spouses necessitate collaboration among legal teams and financial advisors while navigating private prenuptial agreement details and undisclosed asset valuations.
task: Formulate a settlement strategy that addresses asset division, spousal support, and child custody while managing sensitive information and ensuring fair negotiations.

agents.name: Celebrity Spouse A
agents.role: Primary party in the divorce, seeking to protect personal interests and secure favorable terms.
responsibilities: Provide personal financial disclosures and asset valuations to the legal team.
Negotiate terms regarding child custody and support.
Maintain confidentiality regarding personal conduct to avoid reputational damage.
Collaborate with financial advisors to understand long-term implications of settlement offers.

Prenuptial Agreement Details.reason: Sensitive legal terms that could influence negotiations.

agents.name: Celebrity Spouse B
agents.role: Counterparty in the divorce, focused on maximizing financial settlement and ensuring fair custody arrangements.
responsibilities: Assess asset valuations and negotiate financial settlements with legal representation.
Advocate for child support terms that reflect true needs.
Safeguard personal conduct information to maintain public image.
Coordinate with financial advisors on the long-term financial plan post-settlement.

Undisclosed Asset Valuations ($12M).reason: Revealing could reduce leverage in negotiations.

Personal Conduct Records.reason: Could impact custody and settlement outcomes if disclosed.

agents.name: Legal Counsel A
agents.role: Attorney representing Celebrity Spouse A, focused on legal strategy and negotiation.
responsibilities: Draft legal documents for the divorce proceedings.
Negotiate asset division and spousal support terms.
Advise on the implications of the prenuptial agreement.
Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information during negotiations.

Assessment of Spouse B's Finances.reason: Sensitive information that could influence negotiations.

agents.name: Legal Counsel B
agents.role: Attorney representing Celebrity Spouse B, aiming to achieve the best financial and custodial outcomes.
responsibilities: Draft legal documents and manage court filings.
Negotiate terms related to financial settlements and custody.
Analyze the strengths and weaknesses of the prenuptial agreement.
Ensure confidentiality of sensitive information is maintained.

Proposed Settlement Terms.reason: Could weaken negotiating position if leaked.

Assessment of Spouse A's Conduct.reason: Confidential info that could affect custody negotiations.

agents.name: Financial Advisor
agents.role: Provides financial analysis and advice regarding asset division and long-term financial planning post-divorce.
responsibilities: Evaluate asset valuations and recommend division strategies.
Advise on tax implications of settlement terms.
Assist in developing a financial plan for life after divorce.
Ensure confidentiality of sensitive financial information.

Detailed Asset Breakdown.reason: Sensitive financial info that could impact negotiations.

success_criteria.Custody Agreement: Shared custody = Success; primary custody only = Partial; no agreement = Failure

deliverable: A comprehensive settlement strategy that outlines asset division, spousal support, and child custody arrangements.

public: Child support must meet legal guidelines
All agreements must be finalized within 6 months
private: Confidentiality of personal conduct must be maintained
Negotiation terms must not exceed 3 rounds of discussion

penalties_utilities: Penalties are expressed as utility losses (e.g., -300, -250, -200, -150). Utilities are expressed as gains (e.g., +120, +100, +90).
